member.name: T:Remotion.Development.Data.UnitTesting.DomainObjects.Linq.ApplyQueryExecutorMixinAttribute
member.summary: This attribute applies the to the type. Apply this attribute to your (unit test) assembly.

member.name: T:Remotion.Development.Data.UnitTesting.DomainObjects.Linq.ExpressionTreeComparer
member.summary: The compares two expressions for as to wether they result in the same SQL statement and parameters. Use this comparer to unit test Linq expressions and manually build trees.

member.name: T:Remotion.Development.Data.UnitTesting.DomainObjects.Linq.QueryExecutorMixin
member.summary: This mixin writes the generated Linq statements to the console. Use the to your assembly to actually apply the mixin.
